Gemstones.name: Amber
Gemstones.desc: transparent watery gold to rich gold

Gemstones.name: Banded Agate
Gemstones.desc: translucent striped brown, blue, white, or red

Gemstones.name: Black Opal
Gemstones.desc: translucent dark green with black mottling and golden flecks

Gemstones.name: Black Sapphire
Gemstones.desc: translucent lustrous black with glowing highlights

Gemstones.name: Bloodstone
Gemstones.desc: opaque dark gray with red flecks

Gemstones.name: Diamond
Gemstones.desc: transparent blue-white, canary, pink, brown, or blue

Gemstones.name: Eye Agate
Gemstones.desc: translucent circles of gray, white, brown, blue, or green

Gemstones.name: Jade
Gemstones.desc: translucent light green, deep green, or white

Gemstones.name: Lapis Lazuli
Gemstones.desc: opaque light and dark blue with yellow flecks

Gemstones.name: Malachite
Gemstones.desc: opaque striated light and dark green

Gemstones.name: Moonstone
Gemstones.desc: translucent white with pale blue glow

Gemstones.name: Moss Agate
Gemstones.desc: translucent pink or yellow-white with mossy gray or green markings

Gemstones.name: Onyx
Gemstones.desc: opaque bands of black and white, or pure black or white

Gemstones.name: Opal
Gemstones.desc: translucent pale blue with green and golden mottling

Gemstones.name: Pearl
Gemstones.desc: opaque lustrous white, yellow, or pink

Gemstones.name: Quartz
Gemstones.desc: transparent white, smoky gray, or yellow

Gemstones.name: Ruby
Gemstones.desc: transparent clear red to deep crimson

Gemstones.name: Sardonyx
Gemstones.desc: opaque bands of red and white

Gemstones.name: Spinel
Gemstones.desc: transparent red, red-brown, or deep green

Gemstones.name: Star Rose Quartz
Gemstones.desc: translucent rosy stone with white star-shaped center

Gemstones.name: Star Ruby
Gemstones.desc: translucent ruby with white star-shaped center

Gemstones.name: Star Sapphire
Gemstones.desc: translucent blue sapphire with white star-shaped center

Gemstones.name: Tourmaline
Gemstones.desc: transparent pale green, blue, brown, or red
